= Downloading Trigpoint Database =

When you first install the application, you will be prompted to download the trigpoint database.  This database contains the locations of all 
the trigpoints listed on TrigpointingUK.

The application does not currently keep this database up to date automatically.
So you will therefore need to periodically refresh it, in order to pick up 
new trigpoints added to the database.

To manually refresh the database, select the "Download Trig Database" option 
from the main menu.
